titleStmt.title: Starkweather scoreboard: seven days of terror

publicationStmt.p: This document was retrieved from NewspaperArchive.com. The materials are not for distribution and/or reproduction.

figure.figDesc: Image of a drawing done by Starkweather depicting a man running or in motion, to the left of the page. The man has slicked back hair, and an outfit reminiscent of a greaser.Â In his right hand he his holding what appears to be a notebook.
figure.caption: Starkweather drawing, made in prison cell, may be wishful thinking. His art work showed some talent, teachers say, although he never took lessons. His parents urged him to attend art school. Starkweather says now he wishes he had studied art but his real ambition was to run a chicken farm.
